duties_responsibilities.duty: Manage the daily activities of snow removal and environmental services operations.
Develop and implement plans for equipment maintenance, safety, recruitment, and training.
Collaborate with support departments to ensure compliance and positive employee experiences.
Provide job information for all snow removal equipment and personnel dispatched.
Attend conferences, meetings, and social functions to represent the organization's brand.
Collaborate with the sales team to develop a networking and prospecting plan.
Maintain communication with key customers and ensure compliance of vendors and contractors providing snow removal service.
Review, analyze, modify, and implement efficient department budgets, processes, policies, and procedures.
Enforce safety guidelines and promote a safe workplace.
Maintain accurate records and metrics, respond to external customer questions, and resolve problems.
Perform other related duties as assigned by management.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s degree or equivalent work experience in business or a related discipline.
